title: Assessment of Platelet-dependent Thrombosis by an ex Vivo Arterial Injury Model: a Placebo Controlled Trial of Clopidogrel as Antiplatelet Therapy in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and Coronary Artery Disease

operands.value: Diagnosed according to the WHO criteria
Angina plus positive exercise tolerance test
enzyme and/or Q wave positive myocardial infarction
angiographic evidence (>50% stenosis of one vessel)
Provided written consent for participation in the trial prior to any study-specific procedures or requirements
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
Smoking (current smokers and patients who quit smoking less than six months)
Chronic liver disease (Cirrhosis, malignancy and patients with more than twice the upper limit of liver function tests)
Use of other investigational study drugs within 1 year prior to study entry

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Aged between 18 and 75'), Symbol('Diagnosed according to the WHO criteria'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 75 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Patients with CAS'), Symbol('Patients with T2DM'), Symbol('Provided written consent for participation in the trial prior to any study-specific procedures or requirements'), Or(Symbol('Angina plus positive exercise tolerance test'), Symbol('angiographic evidence (>50% stenosis of one vessel)'), Symbol('enzyme and/or Q wave positive myocardial infarction'), Symbol('percutaneous or surgical coronary revascularisation')), Not(Or(Symbol('Chronic liver disease (Cirrhosis, malignancy and patients with more than twice the upper limit of liver function tests)'), Symbol('Contraindication to Clopidogrel'), Symbol('Haematological disorders (Anaemia, malignancy, bleeding disorders)'), Symbol('Malignancy (diagnosed or under investigation)'), Symbol('Previous participation in this study'), Symbol('Smoking (current smokers and patients who quit smoking less than six months)'), Symbol('Unable to consent'), Symbol('Use of corticosteroids/other antithrombotic agents (warfarin)'), Symbol('Use of other investigational study drugs within 1 year prior to study entry'), Symbol('Women of child-bearing potential'))))
